comments.body:
at the moment the test fails with:

```
 graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
    graceful_shutdown_test.go:120: Get "https://127.0.0.1:61393": http2: server sent GOAWAY and closed the connection; LastStreamID=49, ErrCode=NO_ERROR, debug=""
...
```

@caesarxuchao @liggitt this tests graceful shutdown of http/2 servers with golang. Golang <1.16 is definitely broken, and this makes  e.g. `--goaway-chance` for balancing of http/2 connection broken too.
We might want to accept it's broken 1.15, skip the tests in that case, but keep it active from 1.16 on. Wdyt?
